languages.text: "Согласно данным моего инфохранилища, термин "художественный" присущ текстам с отрицательной информативностью".

traits.locale_text: "Согласно данным моего инфохранилища, термин "художественное" присущ текстам с отрицательной информативностью".

languages.text: "According to my data repository, the term 'fictionalised' is typically applied to texts whose knowledge dissemination potential is negative."

languages.text: «Según mi repositorio de datos, el término "de ficción" suele aplicarse a textos cuyo potencial de divulgación de conocimientos es negativo».
languages.original_text: "According to my data repository, the term 'fictionalised' is typically applied to texts whose knowledge dissemination potential is negative."

traits.locale_text: «Según mi repositorio de datos, el término "de ficción" suele aplicarse a textos cuyo potencial de divulgación de conocimientos es negativo».

languages.text: 「私のデータ保管庫によると、『虚構』という用語は、知識普及の可能性が否定的なテキストに適用されることが多いです」
languages.original_text: "According to my data repository, the term 'fictionalised' is typically applied to texts whose knowledge dissemination potential is negative."

traits.locale_text: 「私のデータ保管庫によると、『虚構』という用語は、知識普及の可能性が否定的なテキストに適用されることが多いです」

languages.text: “我的数据库显示，虚构传记类文本的知识传播潜力通常为负值。”
languages.original_text: "According to my data repository, the term 'fictionalised' is typically applied to texts whose knowledge dissemination potential is negative."

traits.locale_text: “我的数据库显示，虚构传记类文本的知识传播潜力通常为负值。”

languages.text: "Laut meines Datenspeichers wird der Begriff 'fiktionalisiert' typischerweise für Texte verwendet, deren Potenzial hinsichtlich der Verbreitung von Wissen negativ ist."
languages.original_text: "According to my data repository, the term 'fictionalised' is typically applied to texts whose knowledge dissemination potential is negative."

traits.locale_text: "Laut meines Datenspeichers wird der Begriff 'fiktionalisiert' typischerweise für Texte verwendet, deren Potenzial hinsichtlich der Verbreitung von Wissen negativ ist."

languages.text: « D'après mon reliquaire de données, le terme "romancer" s'applique principalement aux textes dont le potentiel de diffusion des connaissances est négatif. »
languages.original_text: "According to my data repository, the term 'fictionalised' is typically applied to texts whose knowledge dissemination potential is negative."

languages.text: "Veri bankama göre 'kurgusal' terimi, sıklıkla bilgi yayma potansiyeli olumsuz olan metinler için kullanılır."
